title: Global Head of Industrial Quality and Lean (m/f)
description: as part of the zumtobel group zumtobel stands for holistic lighting solutions that above all enhance people s wellbeing the brand s products unite award winning design with thoughtful integration into the architectural setting as innovation leader zumtobel offers exceptional range of premium luminaires and lighting control systems across the full range of applications job description this key role you assume full responsibility for quality within global manufacturing and supplier quality your main fields of work are you develop and establish a global production and supplier quality organization as well as lean implementation across the globe you develop and implement the quality control plan across all plants including warranty covering and full quality cost model as well as kpi s you develop and lead implementations of lean resulting a zumtobel production system you initiate and lead complex and critical cross functional projects and drive the organization to excellent results you coach and support the local management teams within the sites terms of lessons learned best practice sharing and build global standards you define and improve standards for supplier quality approval and component release processes and assure them via your organization as well as via quality assurance agreements cooperation with global purchasing you define and monitor relevant kpi s and provide clustered feedback to the relevant functions within the organization and initiate projects to improve where necessary you assume responsibility for the iso certification and compliance for all plants including internal external audit and process management your profileyou have a master degree engineering science economics or comparable disciplines international manufacturing process and lean experience should be more than years and a solid quality education is advantageous you are more than years within a senior management role on a global level and have proven success leading cross functional global teams a fasen changing industry you gained already tangible experience project management and qm principles tools on a global level and apply a holistic approach to your daily work your english and german knowledge is perfect goal oriented and pro active person with analytical foresight intercultural expertise a clear idea of what is feasible strong teamwork capabilities and willingness for international travel solid knowledge within the lighting industry or comparable would be beneficial enlightening your career we curiously discover new fields of work together our mentoring program is meant to support you to fully develop your skills and potentials international perspective be part of a network of creativity and high tech and contribute to ecosystem that enables you to realize your potential within multinational intercultural teams work life balance your best individual work life balance vary over time often on a daily basis this why we offer flexible working models and sabbatical options for our employees open minded and respectful culture working for the zg means to be a part of open minded and passionate title: System Architect / Technology Strategist (m/f)
description: curiosity and a passion for innovation have made the tridonic brand the technological nerve centre of the zumtobel group producing smart and energy efficient led modules led drivers sensors and software tridonic delivers the innovativ components that help keep the group at the cutting edge of lighting since tridonic has been serving the luminaire manufacturer market as independent brand generating some of its revenues with luminaire manufacturers around the globe job descriptionin this role you define the reference architecture for future ip based lighting systems including the selection and definition of the ip networksyou collect requirements from product management and internal external customers and you are responsible for defining and controlling the segment technology product roadmapyou are responsible for the system architecture and topology from embedded devices into cloud and cloud applicationsyou are highly involved and integrated into global standards definition and standards compliancyyou are responsible for the definition of system release testsen compliance with system and user acceptance requirements defined by product management and validation teamyou influence hardware software roadmaps with product management based on connectivity strategy technology availability and market needsyou give guidance to and review embedded sw implementation to ensure effective and efficient implementation of the architecture you defined beforeyour profileyou have a master degree electronics computer sciences or physics preferable phd and at least years of experience a comparable industry environmentyou have a basic knowledge product management controlling product calculation and project managementyou have a solid background embedded sw engineering to be able to consider specific constraints while defining architecturesyou are able to define system boundaries and scopeyou have a deep understanding of the global business environment and end user insightyou are thinking systems from top level to the details and from inside out and from outside you are able to tackle problems by using a logical systematic sequential approachyou have a high level of social capability to interact a matrix organizationyou are fluent english the law obliges us to specify a salary here line with the collective agreement this amounts to at least eur for a 38½ hour working week however because neither you nor we are satisfied with minimum standards we promise you that it be more how much more depends on how good you are enlightening your careerwe curiously discover new fields of work together our mentoring program is meant to support you to fully develop your skills and potentials international perspectivebe part of
